name: communicability
content:

medical
  specialized the ability of a disease to be passed from one person to another : Communicability is greatest during the early stages of the disease. The period of communicability ranges from one or more weeks before symptoms appear to months or even years after they disappear.
the ability of something to be communicated : The importance of communicability and clear decision-making should be stressed. Science, being the most general type of systematized knowledge, has the highest communicability. With the decline of old-fashioned storytelling, the communicability of experience suffers.
